name: Janice_Hogan
text:
Janice Hogan
Janice Hogan was a friend of the Palmer family.
Biography
After the death of Laura Palmer, Janice helped Doctor Will Hayward sedate Laura's mother, Sarah, so she could answer questions from Sheriff Harry S. Truman.
Behind the scenes
In the pilot's original script, she is the neighbor of the Palmers and Leland calls her and tells her to go to Sarah after learning about Laura's death.
